The llama2 model is too big to be added to the repository.

Step 1 - Download - It can be downloaded from here :
https://huggingface.co/TheBloke/Llama-2-7B-Chat-GGUF/resolve/main/llama-2-7b-chat.Q5_K_M.gguf?download=true

Step 2 - Place it on the input/external/Llama-2/ directory with the name "llama-2-7b-chat.Q5_K_M.gguf"
